page.title: Ubiquiti Networks UniFi WiFi BaseStation XG (UWB-XG)

revision.text:

|fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W632GU6KB-12 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=4 |wi1_module=Ubiquiti Networks 4X4-5GL |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9994;QCA9994, 0VV, NE646RG4, E064600; |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=QCA9994;QCA9994, 0VV, NE646RG4, E064600; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_module=Ubiquiti Networks 4X4-5GH |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9994;QCA9994, 0VV, NE646RG4, E064600; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_chip1_brand=Atheros |eth_chip1_model=AR8033;AR8033-AL1A, NJ728224, 1728, CHINA; |eth_chip2_brand=Aquantia |eth_chip2_model=AQR107;AQuantia, AQrate, AQR107-B0-EG, UAMP03002.S2, 245B-1726, KOREA; |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8511 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=10GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;Qualcomm (CSR);CSR8811;CSR, 8811, A12U, 649DX9;1; ,,, Single-Chip GPS Receiver;Atheros;AR1511;ATHEROS, AR1511-CF1R, TAET37080.CD, 1550, SINGAPORE;1; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, IP67, Bluetooth 4.1, |802dot11_protocols=an+ac }} {{TagLine|Quad-Radio 802.11ac Wave 2 Access Point}} ''with Dedicated Security and Beamforming Antenna'' :{{ProductPage|https://www.ubnt.com/unifi/unifi-wifi-basestation-xg/}} {{â€¢}} [https://www.balticnetworks.com/docs/UniFi_WiFi_BaseStation_XG_DS.pdf Datasheet]
A fourth radio is visible in the FCC photos. It may be the "Dedicated Security Radio" :and/or a DFS channel monitor. It is 1x1:1 and connected via Mini PCIe.
*[https://www.balticnetworks.com/ubiquiti-unifi-basestation-xg-quad-radio-802-11ac-wave2-black.html '''Ubiquiti Networks''' UniFi WiFi BaseStation XG (UWB-XG-BK)] :802.11ac, 4x4, 5GHz, Tri-Band, Wave 2, MU-MIMO
